summary: This is my attempt at remaking Brelyna Maryon\'s appearance.
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana][size=5]I\'m not sure about you, but I think Skyrim\'s depiction of college girls was a bit depressing. So, I redid Brelyna\'s appearance to make her so much better!

Apart from aesthetic changes, she now has a level cap of 255, instead of the original 30 (if I recall correctly).

If you want her to appear as in the screen-shots, you\'ll need a few things:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full[/url] [b](Required)[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen look_1[/url] [b](Required-ish)[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] [b](Required)[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Caliente Female Body Mod BBE v3[/url] [b](Optional)[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4708]Triss Armor Retextured[/url] [b](Optional)[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27691]Corset from Shadowtroops Projects[/url] [b](Optional)[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105]Sharpshooters Extreme Graphics ENB[/url] [b](Optional)[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture[/url] [b](Optional)[/b]
Thanks to all those above modders! And, of course, thank you to foretrenty\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554]Skyrim NPC Editor[/url], without which many NPC mods would not exist.

As always, don\'t forget to comment about what you think, and check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31778][b]Dragon Aspect Ambient Sound Remover[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31693][b]Explosive Unarmed Punches[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32933][b]Fists of the Mage - Unarmed Gameplay Enhanced[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28565][b]Ice Form Weapons[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33160][b]The Golden Touch - New Spells and Effect Shaders[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31744][b]The Hulk Follower[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28670][b]Weapon Enchantments Redone[/b][/url][/size][/font]
author: BrotherBob
